nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.utils

Class MemberHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.utils.MemberHelper

  • public class MemberHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for members
    WARN: Be aware that this helper doesn't access the services through the security layer. They are all local services.
    Author:
    luis

      • resolveMember

        public Member resolveMember(PrincipalParameters params)
        Checks the ServiceClient.getMember(). If restricted to a member, returns it, ignoring the received id. Otherwise, loads the member with the given principal

      • resolveMember

        public Member resolveMember(PrincipalType principalType,
                   java.lang.String principal)
        Checks the ServiceClient.getMember(). If restricted to a member, returns it, ignoring the received id. Otherwise, loads the member with the given principal

      • resolveMember

        public Member resolveMember(java.lang.String principalType,
                   java.lang.String principal)
        Checks the ServiceClient.getMember(). If restricted to a member, returns it, ignoring the received id. Otherwise, loads the member with the given principal
